OOC: Man, I held out with SEGA, and what did I get? I got stuck with the
sucky Saturn system. My gut tells me that Nintendo is dead. GameCube is
their last hurra. I plan on getting X-Box when the price comes down a
bit. And X-Box is coming out with the sweet looking 'WWF Raw Is War'.
Anyway I just wanted to add my 2 cents!

And yes the PS/PS2 WWF Smackdown series sucks!
